properties.address: x-church, Ashcroft Road, Gainsborough, Lincolnshire DN21 1BY
properties.description: Vulnerable adults 18+ We have a daily soup kitchen at around 1pm every day, Mon - Fri. This is based on any donations we receive. As well as providing a warm space, we offer refreshments throughout the day. We also offer a support service that caters for food and fuel poverty.
properties.title: Gainsborough Crisis Action Team

properties.address: Gainsborough Library, Cobden Street, Gainsborough DN21 2NG
properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children, including a Community Coffee Morning every Tuesday 10am-11am, there is no charge for refreshments.
